Description:
Construction Simulator 2015 - a simulator construction, in which you will manage the various building special equipment for the construction of various objects. Here you take on the role of a novice builder, whose mission - to develop their small company into the largest construction company. In the game you will find more than 100 different missions, during which you will build houses, supermarkets, industrial facilities, 15 licensed construction machinery well-known brands, realistic management technique, realistic sound effects, large areas for free movement, the multiplayer mode and more.

Features:

More than 200 construction sites in more than 150 missions
15 realistic construction machinery, issued LIEBHERR, MAN and Still
ultra-machine control system, even excavators (with the possibility of an arcade mode for beginners)
These sound effects recorded from the original machines

Multiplayer Open free world
Countless dealers and suppliers of equipment and construction materials
Detailed training system
nonlinear dynamical system missions , giving endless gameplay
The economic component - the opportunity to purchase a license and become a real estate developer to developer
The system gain experience and levels, allowing the player to discover hidden unexpected mission
popular support gamepads, controllers, steering wheels and joysticks
Full support for homemade mods and additions


Features repack:

It is based on license.
Do not cut | Do not recoded.
Installing additional software (DirectX, VCRedist).
Author repack - Alpine
